description: Basic CALL message - remote procedure call

autobahn-python:
from autobahn.wamp.message import Call

# Test framework provides 'msg' with deserialized message
assert isinstance(msg, Call)
assert msg.request == 7814135
assert msg.procedure == 'com.myapp.myprocedure1'
assert msg.args == ['Hello, world!']
assert msg.kwargs is None or msg.kwargs == {}

# Check that options are empty/default (all None)
assert msg.timeout is None
assert msg.receive_progress is None

construction.autobahn-python:
from autobahn.wamp.message import Call

msg = Call(
    request=7814135,
    procedure='com.myapp.myprocedure1',
    args=['Hello, world!']
)

notes: CALL is sent by Caller to Dealer to call a remote procedure. Message format: [CALL, Request|id, Options|dict, Procedure|uri] or [CALL, Request|id, Options|dict, Procedure|uri, Arguments|list] or [CALL, Request|id, Options|dict, Procedure|uri, Arguments|list, ArgumentsKw|dict]
